abstract: This week's Riff discusses how the movies "Drive" and "Ides of March" could affect Ryan Gosling's star potential. Below is an accompanying Five-Ku on an older movie that launched the career of a heartthrob of yore.

headline.main: Five-Ku: Short Poems on the Original "Footloose"
